name: ibadAR
description:
Ibada. it is one of my freelance projects for Mobile Platform. This Application offers an Augmented Reality feature if the user records a specific pattern it shows a 3D object or video. Another feature is that the player can also record a video or snap a photo that can also share on social media. The Game builds on Unity and uses AR Foundation, I handle some of its features such as balancing Instantiate objects and input code mechanics.

How to play

Simply aim your camera to Target Object (attached as Screenshoot in this Page)
